notes_display: William Pitkin| John Chester.  Slash cancelled.
issue_place_s: Hartford, Connecticut, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: Forty Shillings.  The possessor of this BILL shall be paid by the Treasurer of the STATE of Connecticut, FORTY SHILLINGS, in Spanish milled Dollars, at the rate of six Shillings each, or other silver or gold Coins equivalent, with Interest at five per Cen
issue_reverse_legend_s: FORTY SHILLINGS, L.M. June 1, 1780.  New London, Printed by TIMO. GREEN.
